subject: Re: Too wierd--and perhaps frightening.
author: mllejade
full_text:
I heard "We nuke the people" quite clearly, and bits of the other 
files.  Very dark stuff.  Is it possible in scanning the bands, that 
there's a band, frequency or transmitter, perhaps governmental, that 
overrides scanning?  

Sharon


--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> 
wrote:
>
> 
>  This is weird, that mono tone voice coming through. This is what I 
get out of the segments I put up last night.  I wanted to see what 
others heard, as while recording all I heard was the usual shortwave 
stations, and noise. A few English stations, some Spanish, and 
something that sounded maybe Korean. 
>  
>  One of my co-workers thinks it he CIA messing with me, they just 
want to see what tunrs up on the net.   Awhhh crap, there's only one 
way to go to be scientific, I'll have to make another and see if it 
gets the same stuff for someone else.   My apologies to those waiting 
for previous projects and e-mail replies, I tend to get side tracked 
with this stuff.   Frank-S
